title: Interaction of disposable face masks (nano)microplastics with antibiotics: performance and mechanisms
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00775H, Paper
Ting Zhang, Xi Chen, Angrui Jiang, Jingfan Qi, Zhaoyang You, Kinjal J Shah
People use disposable faced masks (DFMs) to prevent the spread of COVID-19 viruses. However, due to the lack of available guidelines, these DFMs are scattered around the world. Common masks...
